nodes.text: The One-Oh-Seventh Stormtrooper Legion was a division in the Galactic Empire's Stormtrooper Corps which was active during the Galactic Civil War. Consisting of at least three battalions, the stormtrooper legion specialized in quelling worker uprisings and slave revolts.

In 3 ABY, three full battalions from the One-Oh-Seventh were reassigned from their posts at the planet Kuat following a number of attacks along the Rimma Trade Route by the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry. Everi Chalis, an Imperial defector working with the 61st, learned of the reassignment and relayed the news to acting captain Hazram Namir, blaming the redeployments on the rebel company's actions and the idiocy of the Imperial Ruling Council.
The One-Oh-Seventh Stormtrooper Legion was mentioned in Alexander Freed's 2015 novel, Battlefront: Twilight Company.
